name: Monkey Wars!
storyline:
In a country far, far away, lives a monkey.
He is very happy and he has a big family...
But one day there happens something you don't want to know!
The kingdom has been claimed by the grey monkeys!
They call them selves the greys.
All his family has been kidnapped, but not monkey, he was on the toilet when it happend.
It was over in a second, all his family...gone.
Now monkey is going to find them and save his family.
And you must help him.
